trans-unit.source: The base class for all simple types and complex types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> class.
Gets the post-compilation object type or the built-in XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.
This is a post-schema-compilation infoset property.
The complexType is derived from the type specified by the base value.
The base value must be a QName.
> [!IMPORTANT] > The BaseSchemaType property is obsolete and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType.BaseXmlSchemaType%2A> property.
The built-in XSD data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.
Gets the post-compilation value for the base type of this schema type.
The BaseXmlSchemaType property always has a value, because all schema types have a base type.
This value is set upon schema compilation, making it a part of the post-schema-compilation infoset.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> object representing the base type of this schema type.
Gets the post-compilation value for the data type of the complex type.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> post-schema-compilation value.
Gets the post-compilation information on how this element was derived from its base type.
The following table shows the values that this property can contain.

|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod> value|Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|No derivation method specified.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Derived by Substitution.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Derived by Extension.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Derived by Restriction.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Derived by List.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Derived by Union.|
One of the valid <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the final attribute of the type derivation that indicates if further derivations are allowed.
The following table shows the values that this property can contain for simple type.

|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod> value|Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|No derivation method is specified.
This is the default.

Derivation rules are taken from the schema blockDefault setting.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|`#all`.
Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.| The following table shows the values that this property can contain for complex type.

|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod> value|Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|No derivation method is specified.
This is the default.

Derivation rules are taken from the schema `blockDefault` setting.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod>|`#all`.
Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.|
One of the valid <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod"></xref>.
Gets the post-compilation value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType.Final*> property.
This value indicates how the type is restricted when the type is extended through restriction.
If the type is marked as `final`, this type cannot be extended.
The post-compilation value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType.Final*> property.
The default is the <xref uid="langword_csharp_finalDefault" name="finalDefault" href=""></xref> attribute value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""></xref> element.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType"></xref> that represents the built-in complex type of the complex type specified.
One of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> values representing the complex type.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType"></xref> that represents the built-in complex type.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType"></xref> that represents the built-in complex type of the complex type specified by qualified name.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> of the complex type.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType"></xref> that represents the built-in complex type.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> that represents the built-in simple type of the specified simple type.
You cannot directly serialize the built-in type.
If you need to serialize the type, create a new simple type which derives from the built-in type and serialize the simple type.
One of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> values representing the simple type.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> that represents the built-in simple type.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> that represents the built-in simple type of the simple type that is specified by the qualified name.
You cannot directly serialize the built-in type.
If you need to serialize the type, create a new simple type which derives from the built-in type and serialize the simple type.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> of the simple type.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> that represents the built-in simple type.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating if the derived schema type specified is derived from the base schema type specified
The derived <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> to test.
The base <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> to test the derived <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> against.
One of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDerivationMethod"></xref> values representing a type derivation method to exclude from testing.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the derived type is derived from the base type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating if this type has a mixed content model.
This property is only valid in a complex type.
This virtual method is overridden in derived classes.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type has a mixed content model; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the type.
The name must be an no-colon name (NCName) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification.
If specified, the name must be unique among all `simpleType` and `complexType` elements.
The name of the type.
Gets the qualified name for the type built from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of this type.
This is a post-schema-compilation property.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> for the type built from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of this type.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> of the type.
One of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> values.
